DOC.brief_summary: The current study aim evaluate effect internet-delivered self-help CBT insomnia randomise control trial . Adult person insomnia invite via popular scientific website fill online questionnaire . Participants randomise treatment group wait list . Participants measure 4 , 16 , 40 week intervention questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Insomnia Access internet Alcohol substance abuse Severe depression Being suicidal Sleep apnea Schizophrenic psychosis disorder
